content:
@Michel Rutten asked me to report that on http://hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html the link to Forge is currently broken.
It would be really helpful if someone could please update it and point it to https://simplifier.net/Forge
Is a change request for this needed? Thanks in advance :)
We generally don't make any changes to previously published releases. This is one we might at least consider making though. The mechanism to submit would indeed be a change request.

Sorry for being unclear, my question was meant for a correction in a future release.
Any correction is much appreciated :)
I created [#17236]
